com.mozilla.secops.parser

Class EventFilterPayload

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mozilla.secops.parser.EventFilterPayload
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventFilterPayloadInterface, Serializable

    public class EventFilterPayload
extends Object
implements EventFilterPayloadInterface, Serializable
    Can be associated with EventFilterRule for payload matching
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • withIntegerRangeMatch

        public EventFilterPayload withIntegerRangeMatch(EventFilterPayload.IntegerProperty property,
                                                int low,
                                                int high)
        Add an integer range match to the payload filter

        Will match if the property value falls between low and high inclusively.

        Parameters:
        property - EventFilterPayload.IntegerProperty
        low - Low value for range match
        high - High value for range match
        Returns:
        EventFilterPayload for chaining
